name: Fableverse
description:
In this Creature-Collecting Idler, Fableverse, you Mine and Train with creatures, called Fables. As your Fables grow, they will grow stronger furthering their mining ability. Discover upgrades that will further this output and make things easier. As your operation grows, so will your ability to discover new Fables and trade with traders. The Fableverse offers 30 unique Fables, each with 11 augmented versions. That's 360 Fables to collect! Do you have what it takes to find them all?

  • Collect over 360 Fables (30 unique & 11 augmented versions of each)
  • Upgrade from over 20+ different upgradable effects
  • Accumulate Fablecoins from your idle mining operation and continue to increase it's output
  • Balance and tinker with different fables, each with their own unique set of genetics, and species base stats
  • Breed and min-max the output of your fables, by trying to create the perfect fable
  • Trade with the traders, in order to discover new fable species, with rarer fables having increasingly harder requirements

What's in the Demo?
The demo is the same as the full game, but with a level cap of 25 for the Fables, which does affect how far you can get with some of the level requirements, but gives a taste for all the mechanics and gameplay.
